exclusion.criterion: Urinary tract infection, Urinary stone(s), Urinary tract tumor
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Radiation therapy for urologic malignancy or prostate surgery; radiation to pelvic, colon, rectum, prostate, bladder, uterus or ovaries
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Alpha blocker therapy or anticholinergic therapy within 3 months of entry or 5 alpha reductase therapy within 18 months.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of cataracts with planned surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has lower urinary tract symptoms including frequency, urgency, weak stream, incomplete emptying and intermittent flow for the past 9 months. He is otherwise healthy.
